root.title: Mark as root configuration
root.description: If this is set to true no further configurations will be searched.

extends.title: Configurations to extend
extends.description: Array of shareable or builtin configurations to extend.

elements.title: Element metadata to load
elements.description: Array of modules, plugins or files to load element metadata from. Use <rootDir> to refer to the folder with the package.json file.

plugins.title: Plugins to load
plugins.description: Array of plugins load. Use <rootDir> to refer to the folder with the package.json file.

transform.title: File transformations to use.
transform.description: Object where key is regular expression to match filename and value is name of transformer.

rules.title: Rule configuration.
rules.description: Enable/disable rules, set severity. Some rules have additional configuration like style or patterns to use.
